Articles.Content: Alter  update The game crashes on loading screen and CE-34878 shows up ... reinstaled game 2 times, and  still got the problem  :/  before The update the game worked fine .. what should I do ?

Try delete "common data". It worked for me once. But the game created new "common data". And the bug repeated. So you can always delete common data before starting game or maybe there is bettet solution.

We have received similar reports from PS4 users having their consoles in French. You can try changing the language to a different one. 

As @Invenisso said erasing "common data" every time before loading the game is a work around for this bug too.
The problèm is : i am french !

After changing language from Polish to English bug disappeared.

Edited March 28, 2019 by Invenisso
Yes but it is not possible for me i am french, is there any fix ?
New update (1.05) has been released which resolves this problem.
